verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> being <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G1223>By<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2476>stand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> so, <S%G235>but<s%> we <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>: <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>;
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G1382>experience<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1382>experience<s%>, <S%G1680>hope<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2617>maketh<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2617>ashamed<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is shed <S%G1632>abroad<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> when <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> without <S%G772>strength<s%>, in <S%G2596>due<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%>. in due time: or, according to the time

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G599>will<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>: <S%G1063>yet<s%> <S%G5029>peradventure<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> a good <S%G18>man<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5111>would<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4921>commendeth<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, in <S%G3754>that<s%>, while <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>.

<S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>, <S%G1344>being<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, when we <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%>, we were <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%>, being <S%G2644>reconciled<s%>, we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> so, <S%G235>but<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>joy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G2643>atonement<s%>. atonement: or, reconciliation

<S%G1063>(For<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1677>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1677>imputed<s%> when there <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam<s%> <S%G3360>to<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them that <S%G264>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> the <S%G3667>similitude<s%> of <S%G76>Adam's<s%> <S%G3847>transgression<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5179>figure<s%> of him that was to <S%G3195>come<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3900>offence<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is the free <S%G5486>gift<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> through the <S%G3900>offence<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G599>dead<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, which <S%G3588>is<s%> by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, hath <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it was <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> that <S%G264>sinned<s%>, so is the <S%G1434>gift<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3303><s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> the free <S%G5486>gift<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3900>offences<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1345>justification<s%>.

<S%G686>Therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3900>offence<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> judgment came <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%>; <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> the free gift came <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1347>justification<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>. by the offence: or, by one offence by the righteousness: or, by one righteousness

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3922>entered<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3900>offence<s%> might <S%G4121>abound<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4121>abounded<s%>, <S%G5485>grace<s%> did much more <S%G5248>abound<s%>:
